df-ring
blocks.content: Define class of all (unital) rings. A unital ring is a set equipped with two everywhere-defined internal operations, whose first one is an additive group structure and the second one is a multiplicative monoid structure, and where the addition is left- and right-distributive for the multiplication. Definition 1 in [BourbakiAlg1] p. 92 or definition of a ring with identity in part Preliminaries of [Roman] p. 19. So that the additive structure must be abelian (see ~ ringcom ), care must be taken that in the case of a non-unital ring, the commutativity of addition must be postulated and cannot be proved from the other conditions. (Contributed by NM, 18-Oct-2012.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-Dec-2014.)

thm mgpf() {
  |- wf(cres(cmgp, crg), crg, cmnd)
} = {
  mpbir2an(wf(cres(cmgp, crg), crg, cmnd), wfn(cres(cmgp, crg), crg), wral(hs0, crg, wcel(cfv(cres(cmgp, crg), cv(hs0)), cmnd)))
  mp2an(wfn(cres(cmgp, crg), crg), wfn(cmgp, universe), wss(crg, universe))
  fnmgp()
  ssv(crg)
  fnssres(cmgp, universe, crg)
  rgen(hs0, crg, wcel(cfv(cres(cmgp, crg), cv(hs0)), cmnd))
  eqeltrd(cfv(cres(cmgp, crg), cv(hs0)), cmnd, cfv(cmgp, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), crg))
  fvres(cv(hs0), crg, cmgp)
  ringmgp(cv(hs0), cfv(cmgp, cv(hs0)))
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, cv(hs0)))
  ffnfv(hs0, cres(cmgp, crg), crg, cmnd)
  diff.hs0.c(cres(cmgp, crg))
  diff.hs0.c(crg)
  diff.hs0.c(cmnd)
}

  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cmulr, c0))
} = {

  ringmgp(c0, cfv(cmgp, c0))

  iscmn(s0, s1, cfv(cmgp, c0), c1, c2)

  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cur, c0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, c1), c1), wceq(co(c1, c3, cv(s0)), c1), wceq(co(cfv(cur, c0), c3, c1), c1), wceq(co(c1, c3, cfv(cur, c0)), c1))
  eqeq1d(co(cv(s0), c3, c1), c1, co(cfv(cur, c0), c3, c1), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cur, c0)))

  eqid((1r ` c0))

blocks.name: rngo2times
blocks.content: A ring element plus itself is two times the element. "Two" in an arbitrary unital ring is the sum of the unit with itself. (Contributed by AV, 24-Aug-2021.)

thm rngo2times(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {

} = {
  eqtr4d(co(c1, c3, c1), co(co(c4, c3, c4), c5, c1), co(co(c4, c5, c1), c3, co(c4, c5, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)))

  eqcomd(c1, co(c4, c5, c1), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)))

  simpl(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2))
  adantr(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  ringidcl(c0, c4, c2)
  simpr(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2))
  ringdir(c0, c4, c2, c4, c1, c3, c5)

  simpl(c0 ∈ Ring, c1 ∈ c2)

} = {
  ismgmid2(hs0, c3, cfv(c0g, c4), cfv(cbs, c4), c4, cfv(cplusg, c4), w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c1)))

  ringridm(c0, cv(hs0), c2, cfv(cmulr, c0), c3)

blocks.pretty:
thm ringidss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Ring ∧ c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c1)→ c3 =(0 ` c4))

  sselda(hs0, (Base ` c4), c2, (c0 ∈ Ring ∧ c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c1))

  oveqd(hs0, (× ` c0), c3, (+ ` c4), ((c0 ∈ Ring ∧ c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c1)∧ hs0 ∈ c2))

blocks.name: crngpropd
blocks.content: If two structures have the same group components (properties), one is a commutative ring iff the other one is. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm crngpropd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, ccrg)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(s1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  3bitr4g(w0, wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, ccrg), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cfv(cmgp, c0), ccmn)), wa(wcel(c1, crg), wcel(cfv(cmgp, c1), ccmn)))
  anbi12d(w0, wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cfv(cmgp, c0), ccmn), wcel(c1, crg), wcel(cfv(cmgp, c1), ccmn))
  ringpropd(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  cmnpropd(s0, s1, cfv(cmgp, c0), cfv(cmgp, c1), c2, w0)
  syl6eq(c2, cfv(cbs, cfv(cmgp, c0)), cfv(cbs, c0), w0)
  mgpbas(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cmgp, c0), c0)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  syl6eq(c2, cfv(cbs, cfv(cmgp, c1)), cfv(cbs, c1), w0)
  mgpbas(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cmgp, c1), c1)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
  3eqtr3g(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, cfv(cmgp, c0)), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, cfv(cmgp, c1)), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(s1)), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2))))
  oveqi(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c0), cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, cfv(cmgp, c0)))
  mgpplusg(cfv(cmulr, c0), cfv(cmgp, c0), c0)
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c0))
  oveqi(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, cfv(cmgp, c1)))
  mgpplusg(cfv(cmulr, c1), cfv(cmgp, c1), c1)
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c1))
  iscrng(c0, cfv(cmgp, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, c0))
  iscrng(c1, cfv(cmgp, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cmgp, c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cmgp, c1)

  diff.cfv.s(s1, cmgp, c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cmgp, c1)
  diff.cmgp.s(s1)

blocks.pretty:
thm crngpropd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ∈ CRing ↔ c1 ∈ CRing))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 =(Base ` c0))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 =(Base ` c1))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c2 ∧ s1 ∈ c2))→(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)=(s0[(+ ` c1)]s1))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c2 ∧ s1 ∈ c2))→(s0[(× ` c0)]s1)=(s0[(× ` c1)]s1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  3bitr4g(w0, c0 ∈ CRing, c1 ∈ CRing, (c0 ∈ Ring ∧(mulGrp ` c0)∈ CMnd), (c1 ∈ Ring ∧(mulGrp ` c1)∈ CMnd))
  anbi12d(w0, c0 ∈ Ring, (mulGrp ` c0)∈ CMnd, c1 ∈ Ring, (mulGrp ` c1)∈ CMnd)
  ringpropd(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  cmnpropd(s0, s1, (mulGrp ` c0), (mulGrp ` c1), c2, w0)
  syl6eq(c2, (Base `(mulGrp ` c0)), (Base ` c0), w0)
  mgpbas((Base ` c0), (mulGrp ` c0), c0)
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  syl6eq(c2, (Base `(mulGrp ` c1)), (Base ` c1), w0)
  mgpbas((Base ` c1), (mulGrp ` c1), c1)
  eqid((Base ` c1))
  3eqtr3g((s0[(+ `(mulGrp ` c0))]s1), (s0[(+ `(mulGrp ` c1))]s1), (s0[(× ` c0)]s1), (s0[(× ` c1)]s1), (w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c2 ∧ s1 ∈ c2)))
  oveqi(s0, (× ` c0), s1, (+ `(mulGrp ` c0)))
  mgpplusg((× ` c0), (mulGrp ` c0), c0)
  eqid((× ` c0))
  oveqi(s0, (× ` c1), s1, (+ `(mulGrp ` c1)))

blocks.name: ringprop
blocks.content: If two structures have the same ring components (properties), one is a ring iff the other one is. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Oct-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm ringprop(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, crg))
  -| wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wceq(cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cplusg, c1))
  -| wceq(cfv(cmulr, c0), cfv(cmulr, c1))
} = {
  mptru(wb(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, crg)))
  ringpropd(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c0), wtru)
  eqidd(cfv(cbs, c0), wtru)
  a1i(wtru, wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1)))
  a1i(wa(wtru, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0)))), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1))))
  oveqi(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c1))
  a1i(wa(wtru, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0)))), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c0), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(hs1))))
  oveqi(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c0), cv(hs1), cfv(cmulr, c1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wtru)
  diff.hs1.w(wtru)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ringprop(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Ring ↔ c1 ∈ Ring)
  ⊣ (Base ` c0)=(Base ` c1)
  ⊣ (+ ` c0)=(+ ` c1)
  ⊣ (× ` c0)=(× ` c1)
} = {
  mptru((c0 ∈ Ring ↔ c1 ∈ Ring))
  ringpropd(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, (Base ` c0), wtru)
  eqidd((Base ` c0), wtru)
  a1i(wtru, (Base ` c0)=(Base ` c1))
  a1i((T ∧(hs0 ∈(Base ` c0)∧ hs1 ∈(Base ` c0))), (hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)=(hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1))
  oveqi(hs0, (+ ` c0), hs1, (+ ` c1))
  a1i((T ∧(hs0 ∈(Base ` c0)∧ hs1 ∈(Base ` c0))), (hs0[(× ` c0)]hs1)=(hs0[(× ` c1)]hs1))
  oveqi(hs0, (× ` c0), hs1, (× ` c1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c((Base ` c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c((Base ` c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wtru)
  diff.hs1.w(wtru)
}

blocks.content: Properties that determine a ring. (Contributed by NM, 2-Aug-2013.)

thm isringd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, crg))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cplusg, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c3, cfv(cmulr, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp))
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wcel(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c3, co(cv(s1), c3, cv(s2)))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2))), co(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), c2, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s2)))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2)), co(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s2)), c2, co(cv(s1), c3, cv(s2)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(co(c4, c3, cv(s0)), cv(s0)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, c4), cv(s0)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)

  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  syl3anbrc(w0, wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(cfv(cmgp, c0), cmnd), wral(s0, cfv(cbs, c0), wral(s1, cfv(cbs, c0), wral(s2, cfv(cbs, c0), wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c0), co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s2))), co(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c0), cv(s1)), cfv(cplusg, c0), co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c0), cv(s2)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), cfv(cmulr, c0), cv(s2)), co(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c0), cv(s2)), cfv(cplusg, c0), co(cv(s1), cfv(cmulr, c0), cv(s2)))))))))
  ismndd(s0, s1, s2, cfv(cmgp, c0), c1, c3, c4, w0)
  syl6eq(c1, cfv(cbs, cfv(cmgp, c0)), cfv(cbs, c0), w0)
  mgpbas(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cmgp, c0), c0)
  syl6eq(c3, cfv(cplusg, cfv(cmgp, c0)), cfv(cmulr, c0), w0)

blocks.name: iscrngd
blocks.content: Properties that determine a commutative ring. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm iscrngd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, ccrg))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cplusg, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c3, cfv(cmulr, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp))
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wcel(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c3, co(cv(s1), c3, cv(s2)))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2))), co(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), c2, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s2)))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2)), co(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s2)), c2, co(cv(s1), c3, cv(s2)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(co(c4, c3, cv(s0)), cv(s0)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, c4), cv(s0)))
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  sylanbrc(w0, wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cfv(cmgp, c0), ccmn))
  isringd(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  iscmnd(s0, s1, cfv(cmgp, c0), c1, c3, w0)
  ismndd(s0, s1, s2, cfv(cmgp, c0), c1, c3, c4, w0)
  syl6eq(c1, cfv(cbs, cfv(cmgp, c0)), cfv(cbs, c0), w0)
  mgpbas(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cmgp, c0), c0)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  syl6eq(c3, cfv(cplusg, cfv(cmgp, c0)), cfv(cmulr, c0), w0)
  mgpplusg(cfv(cmulr, c0), cfv(cmgp, c0), c0)
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c0))
  iscrng(c0, cfv(cmgp, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cmgp, c0)
  diff.cmgp.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cmgp, c0)
  diff.cmgp.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s2, cmgp, c0)
  diff.cmgp.s(s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm iscrngd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ CRing)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 =(Base ` c0))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 =(+ ` c0))
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 =(× ` c0))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Grp)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)→(s0[c3]s1)∈ c1)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c1 ∧ s2 ∈ c1))→((s0[c3]s1)[c3]s2)=(s0[c3](s1[c3]s2)))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c1 ∧ s2 ∈ c1))→(s0[c3](s1[c2]s2))=((s0[c3]s1)[c2](s0[c3]s2)))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c1 ∧ s2 ∈ c1))→((s0[c2]s1)[c3]s2)=((s0[c3]s2)[c2](s1[c3]s2)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ c1)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)→(c4[c3]s0)= s0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)→(s0[c3]c4)= s0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)→(s0[c3]s1)=(s1[c3]s0))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  sylanbrc(w0, c0 ∈ CRing, c0 ∈ Ring, (mulGrp ` c0)∈ CMnd)
  isringd(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  iscmnd(s0, s1, (mulGrp ` c0), c1, c3, w0)
  ismndd(s0, s1, s2, (mulGrp ` c0), c1, c3, c4, w0)
  syl6eq(c1, (Base `(mulGrp ` c0)), (Base ` c0), w0)
  mgpbas((Base ` c0), (mulGrp ` c0), c0)
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  syl6eq(c3, (+ `(mulGrp ` c0)), (× ` c0), w0)
  mgpplusg((× ` c0), (mulGrp ` c0), c0)
  eqid((× ` c0))
  iscrng(c0, (mulGrp ` c0))
  eqid((mulGrp ` c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cmgp, c0)
  diff.cmgp.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cmgp, c0)
  diff.cmgp.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s2, cmgp, c0)
  diff.cmgp.s(s2)
}

blocks.name: ringlz
blocks.content: The zero of a unital ring is a left-absorbing element. (Contributed by FL, 31-Aug-2009.)
blocks.origin:
thm ringlz(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(c3, c4, c1), c3))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cmulr, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c0))
} = {
  mpbid(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(c3, c4, c1), c3), wceq(co(co(c3, c4, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), co(c3, c4, c1)), co(co(c3, c4, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), c3)))
  3eqtr3d(co(co(c3, c4, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), co(c3, c4, c1)), co(co(c3, c4, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), c3), co(co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c0), c3), c4, c1), co(c3, c4, c1), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)))
  oveq1d(co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c0), c3), c4, c1, c3, wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c0), c3), c3))
  syl(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c0), c3), c3), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  mpdan(wcel(c0, cgrp), wceq(co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c0), c3), c3), wcel(c3, c2))
  grplid(c0, c3, c2, c3, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  syldan(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(co(co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c0), c3), c4, c1), co(co(c3, c4, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), co(c3, c4, c1))), w3a(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c1, c2)))
  3jca(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c1, c2))
  ringdir(c0, c3, c2, c3, c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), c4)
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(c3, c4, c1), co(co(c3, c4, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), c3)), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(co(c3, c4, c1), c2))
  eqcomd(co(c3, c4, c1), co(co(c3, c4, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), c3), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(co(c3, c4, c1), c2)))
  grprid(c0, co(c3, c4, c1), c2, cfv(cplusg, c0), c3)
  syl13anc(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wceq(co(co(c3, c4, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), co(c3, c4, c1)), co(co(c3, c4, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), c3)), wceq(co(c3, c4, c1), c3)), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(co(c3, c4, c1), c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(co(c3, c4, c1), c2))
  adantr(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(co(c3, c4, c1), c2), wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c1, c2))
  simpl(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2))
  adantr(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  syl(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  ringgrp(c0)
  grpidcl(c0, c3, c2)
  simpr(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2))
  ringcl(c0, c3, c2, c1, c4)
  grplcan(c0, co(c3, c4, c1), c2, c3, co(c3, c4, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ringlz(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Ring ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→(c3[c4]c1)= c3)
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(× ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(0 ` c0)
} = {
  mpbid((c0 ∈ Ring ∧ c1 ∈ c2), (c3[c4]c1)= c3, ((c3[c4]c1)[(+ ` c0)](c3[c4]c1))=((c3[c4]c1)[(+ ` c0)]c3))
  3eqtr3d(((c3[c4]c1)[(+ ` c0)](c3[c4]c1)), ((c3[c4]c1)[(+ ` c0)]c3), ((c3[(+ ` c0)]c3)[c4]c1), (c3[c4]c1), (c0 ∈ Ring ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  oveq1d((c3[(+ ` c0)]c3), c4, c1, c3, (c0 ∈ Ring ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  adantr(c0 ∈ Ring, c1 ∈ c2, (c3[(+ ` c0)]c3)= c3)
  syl(c0 ∈ Ring, (c3[(+ ` c0)]c3)= c3, c0 ∈ Grp)
  mpdan(c0 ∈ Grp, (c3[(+ ` c0)]c3)= c3, c3 ∈ c2)
  grplid(c0, c3, c2, c3, (+ ` c0))
  syldan(c0 ∈ Ring, c1 ∈ c2, ((c3[(+ ` c0)]c3)[c4]c1)=((c3[c4]c1)[(+ ` c0)](c3[c4]c1)), (c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  3jca((c0 ∈ Ring ∧ c1 ∈ c2), c3 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c1 ∈ c2)
  ringdir(c0, c3, c2, c3, c1, (+ ` c0), c4)
  syl2anc((c0 ∈ Ring ∧ c1 ∈ c2), (c3[c4]c1)=((c3[c4]c1)[(+ ` c0)]c3), c0 ∈ Grp, (c3[c4]c1)∈ c2)
  eqcomd((c3[c4]c1), ((c3[c4]c1)[(+ ` c0)]c3), (c0 ∈ Grp ∧(c3[c4]c1)∈ c2))
  grprid(c0, (c3[c4]c1), c2, (+ ` c0), c3)
  syl13anc((c0 ∈ Ring ∧ c1 ∈ c2), (((c3[c4]c1)[(+ ` c0)](c3[c4]c1))=((c3[c4]c1)[(+ ` c0)]c3)↔(c3[c4]c1)= c3), c0 ∈ Grp, (c3[c4]c1)∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, (c3[c4]c1)∈ c2)
  adantr(c0 ∈ Ring, c1 ∈ c2, c0 ∈ Grp)
  syl3anc((c0 ∈ Ring ∧ c1 ∈ c2), (c3[c4]c1)∈ c2, c0 ∈ Ring, c3 ∈ c2, c1 ∈ c2)

blocks.name: ring1eq0
blocks.content: If one and zero are equal, then any two elements of a ring are equal. Alternately, every ring has one distinct from zero except the zero ring containing the single element ` { 0 } ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Sep-2014.)

thm ring1eq0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {

  -| wceq(c5, cfv(c0g, c0))

  ex(w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(c4, c5), wceq(c1, c3))

  eqtr4d(co(c4, cfv(cmulr, c0), c3), co(c5, cfv(cmulr, c0), c1), co(c5, cfv(cmulr, c0), c3), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(c4, c5)))
  oveq1d(c4, cfv(cmulr, c0), c3, c5, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(c4, c5)))
  simpr(w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(c4, c5))

  ringlz(c0, c3, c2, c5, cfv(cmulr, c0))

  simpl1(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wceq(c4, c5))

  ringlz(c0, c3, c2, c5, (× ` c0))

thm ringnegl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {

blocks.name: rngnegr
blocks.content: Negation in a ring is the same as right multiplication by -1. ( ~ rngonegmn1r analog.) (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 19-Jun-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm rngnegr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, cfv(c2, c3)), cfv(c2, c0)))

  eqcomd(co(c0, c1, cfv(c2, c3)), cfv(c2, c0), w0)
  mpbird(w0, wceq(cfv(c2, c0), co(c0, c1, cfv(c2, c3))), wceq(co(co(c0, c1, cfv(c2, c3)), cfv(cplusg, c5), c0), cfv(c0g, c5)))
  3eqtr3rd(co(co(c0, c1, cfv(c2, c3)), cfv(cplusg, c5), c0), cfv(c0g, c5), co(c0, c1, co(cfv(c2, c3), cfv(cplusg, c5), c3)), co(co(c0, c1, cfv(c2, c3)), cfv(cplusg, c5), co(c0, c1, c3)), w0)
  syl13anc(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, co(cfv(c2, c3), cfv(cplusg, c5), c3)), co(co(c0, c1, cfv(c2, c3)), cfv(cplusg, c5), co(c0, c1, c3))), wcel(c5, crg), wcel(c0, c4), wcel(cfv(c2, c3), c4), wcel(c3, c4))
  ringdi(c5, c0, c4, cfv(c2, c3), c3, c1, cfv(cplusg, c5))
  eqtrd(co(c0, c1, co(cfv(c2, c3), cfv(cplusg, c5), c3)), cfv(c0g, c5), co(c0, c1, cfv(c0g, c5)), w0)
  oveq2d(c0, c1, co(cfv(c2, c3), cfv(cplusg, c5), c3), cfv(c0g, c5), w0)

  ringrz(c5, c0, c4, c1, cfv(c0g, c5))

  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c3), c0), wcel(c5, crg), wcel(c0, c4))

  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cfv(c2, c3), c4), wcel(c5, cgrp), wcel(c3, c4))
  syl(w0, wcel(c5, cgrp), wcel(c5, crg))
  ringgrp(c5)
  syl(w0, wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, crg))

  grpinvcl(c5, c3, c4, c2)
  ringcl(c5, c0, c4, cfv(c2, c3), c1)
  grpinvid2(c5, c0, c4, co(c0, c1, cfv(c2, c3)), c2, cfv(cplusg, c5), cfv(c0g, c5))

thm ringmneg1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {

blocks.name: ring1
blocks.content: The (smallest) structure representing a _zero ring_. (Contributed by AV, 28-Apr-2019.)

blocks.name: ringn0
blocks.content: Rings exist. (Contributed by AV, 29-Apr-2019.)

blocks.name: ringlghm
blocks.content: Left-multiplication in a ring by a fixed element of the ring is a group homomorphism. (It is not usually a ring homomorphism.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-May-2015.)

blocks.name: gsummgp0
blocks.content: If one factor in a finite group sum of the multiplicative group of a commutative ring is 0, the whole "sum" (i.e. product) is 0. (Contributed by AV, 3-Jan-2019.)

blocks.name: prdscrngd
blocks.content: A product of commutative rings is a commutative ring. Since the resulting ring will have zero divisors in all nontrivial cases, this cannot be strengthened much further. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm prdscrngd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, ccrg))
  -| wceq(c0, co(c1, cprds, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c2, c3, ccrg))
} = {
  sylanbrc(w0, wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cfv(cmgp, c0), ccmn))
  prdsringd(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  sylancl(w0, wf(c2, c3, crg), wf(c2, c3, ccrg), wss(ccrg, crg))
  ssriv(hs0, ccrg, crg)
  crngring(cv(hs0))
  fss(c2, c3, ccrg, crg)
  mpbird(w0, wcel(cfv(cmgp, c0), ccmn), wcel(co(c1, cprds, ccom(cmgp, c2)), ccmn))
  prdscmnd(co(c1, cprds, ccom(cmgp, c2)), c1, ccom(cmgp, c2), c3, c4, c5, w0)

  mpbir2an(wf(cres(cmgp, ccrg), ccrg, ccmn), wfn(cres(cmgp, ccrg), ccrg), wral(hs0, ccrg, wcel(cfv(cres(cmgp, ccrg), cv(hs0)), ccmn)))
  mp2an(wfn(cres(cmgp, ccrg), ccrg), wfn(cmgp, universe), wss(ccrg, universe))
  fnmgp()
  ssv(ccrg)
  fnssres(cmgp, universe, ccrg)
  rgen(hs0, ccrg, wcel(cfv(cres(cmgp, ccrg), cv(hs0)), ccmn))
  eqeltrd(cfv(cres(cmgp, ccrg), cv(hs0)), ccmn, cfv(cmgp, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), ccrg))
  fvres(cv(hs0), ccrg, cmgp)
  crngmgp(cv(hs0), cfv(cmgp, cv(hs0)))
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, cv(hs0)))
  ffnfv(hs0, cres(cmgp, ccrg), ccrg, ccmn)
  fco2(cmgp, ccrg, ccmn, c2, c3)
  cmnpropd(hs0, hs1, cfv(cmgp, c0), co(c1, cprds, ccom(cmgp, c2)), cfv(cbs, cfv(cmgp, c0)), w0)
  eqidd(cfv(cbs, cfv(cmgp, c0)), w0)
  simpld(w0, wceq(cfv(cbs, cfv(cmgp, c0)), cfv(cbs, co(c1, cprds, ccom(cmgp, c2)))), wceq(cfv(cplusg, cfv(cmgp, c0)), cfv(cplusg, co(c1, cprds, ccom(cmgp, c2)))))
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, cfv(cplusg, cfv(cmgp, c0)), cfv(cplusg, co(c1, cprds, ccom(cmgp, c2))), w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, cfv(cmgp, c0))), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, cfv(cmgp, c0)))))
  simprd(w0, wceq(cfv(cplusg, cfv(cmgp, c0)), cfv(cplusg, co(c1, cprds, ccom(cmgp, c2)))), wceq(cfv(cbs, cfv(cmgp, c0)), cfv(cbs, co(c1, cprds, ccom(cmgp, c2)))))
  prdsmgp(cfv(cmgp, c0), co(c1, cprds, ccom(cmgp, c2)), c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  eqid(co(c1, cprds, ccom(cmgp, c2)))
  ffnd(c2, c3, ccrg, w0)
  iscrng(c0, cfv(cmgp, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(ccrg)

  diff.hs0.c(ccmn)

thm prdscrngd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ CRing)
  ⊣ c0 =(c1[×]c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c2 : c3 → CRing))
} = {
  sylanbrc(w0, c0 ∈ CRing, c0 ∈ Ring, (mulGrp ` c0)∈ CMnd)
  prdsringd(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  sylancl(w0, (c2 : c3 → Ring), (c2 : c3 → CRing), CRing ⊆ Ring)
  ssriv(hs0, ccrg, crg)
  crngring(hs0)
  fss(c2, c3, ccrg, crg)
  mpbird(w0, (mulGrp ` c0)∈ CMnd, (c1[×](mulGrp ∘ c2))∈ CMnd)
  prdscmnd((c1[×](mulGrp ∘ c2)), c1, (mulGrp ∘ c2), c3, c4, c5, w0)
  sylancr(w0, ((mulGrp ∘ c2): c3 → CMnd), ((mulGrp |` CRing): CRing → CMnd), (c2 : c3 → CRing))
  mpbir2an(((mulGrp |` CRing): CRing → CMnd), (mulGrp |` CRing)[Fn]CRing, ∀(hs0 ∈ CRing,((mulGrp |` CRing)` hs0)∈ CMnd))
  mp2an((mulGrp |` CRing)[Fn]CRing, mulGrp[Fn]𝕌, CRing ⊆ 𝕌)
  fnmgp()
  ssv(ccrg)
  fnssres(cmgp, universe, ccrg)
  rgen(hs0, ccrg, ((mulGrp |` CRing)` hs0)∈ CMnd)
  eqeltrd(((mulGrp |` CRing)` hs0), ccmn, (mulGrp ` hs0), hs0 ∈ CRing)
  fvres(hs0, ccrg, cmgp)
  crngmgp(hs0, (mulGrp ` hs0))
  eqid((mulGrp ` hs0))
  ffnfv(hs0, (mulGrp |` CRing), ccrg, ccmn)
  fco2(cmgp, ccrg, ccmn, c2, c3)
  cmnpropd(hs0, hs1, (mulGrp ` c0), (c1[×](mulGrp ∘ c2)), (Base `(mulGrp ` c0)), w0)
  eqidd((Base `(mulGrp ` c0)), w0)
  simpld(w0, (Base `(mulGrp ` c0))=(Base `(c1[×](mulGrp ∘ c2))), (+ `(mulGrp ` c0))=(+ `(c1[×](mulGrp ∘ c2))))
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, (+ `(mulGrp ` c0)), (+ `(c1[×](mulGrp ∘ c2))), w0, (hs0 ∈(Base `(mulGrp ` c0))∧ hs1 ∈(Base `(mulGrp ` c0))))
  simprd(w0, (+ `(mulGrp ` c0))=(+ `(c1[×](mulGrp ∘ c2))), (Base `(mulGrp ` c0))=(Base `(c1[×](mulGrp ∘ c2))))
  prdsmgp((mulGrp ` c0), (c1[×](mulGrp ∘ c2)), c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  eqid((c1[×](mulGrp ∘ c2)))
  ffnd(c2, c3, ccrg, w0)
  iscrng(c0, (mulGrp ` c0))
  eqid((mulGrp ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c(ccrg)
  diff.hs0.c(crg)
  diff.hs0.c((mulGrp |` CRing))
  diff.hs0.c(ccmn)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c((mulGrp ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c((c1[×](mulGrp ∘ c2)))
  diff.hs0.c((Base `(mulGrp ` c0)))
  diff.hs1.c((mulGrp ` c0))
  diff.hs1.c((c1[×](mulGrp ∘ c2)))
  diff.hs1.c((Base `(mulGrp ` c0)))

blocks.name: prds1
blocks.content: Value of the ring unit in a structure family product. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm prds1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(ccom(cur, c0), cfv(cur, c1)))
  -| wceq(c1, co(c2, cprds, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c3, crg))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(ccom(cur, c0), cfv(cur, c1), ccom(c0g, ccom(cmgp, c0)), cfv(c0g, cfv(cmgp, c1)), w0)
  eqtr4d(ccom(c0g, ccom(cmgp, c0)), cfv(c0g, cfv(cmgp, c1)), cfv(c0g, co(c2, cprds, ccom(cmgp, c0))), w0)
  prds0g(ccom(cmgp, c0), co(c2, cprds, ccom(cmgp, c0)), c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  sylancr(w0, wf(ccom(cmgp, c0), c3, cmnd), wf(cres(cmgp, crg), crg, cmnd), wf(c0, c3, crg))
  mgpf()
  fco2(cmgp, crg, cmnd, c0, c3)
  grpidpropd(hs0, hs1, cfv(cmgp, c1), co(c2, cprds, ccom(cmgp, c0)), cfv(cbs, cfv(cmgp, c1)), w0)
  eqidd(cfv(cbs, cfv(cmgp, c1)), w0)
  simpld(w0, wceq(cfv(cbs, cfv(cmgp, c1)), cfv(cbs, co(c2, cprds, ccom(cmgp, c0)))), wceq(cfv(cplusg, cfv(cmgp, c1)), cfv(cplusg, co(c2, cprds, ccom(cmgp, c0)))))
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, cfv(cplusg, cfv(cmgp, c1)), cfv(cplusg, co(c2, cprds, ccom(cmgp, c0))), w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, cfv(cmgp, c1))), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, cfv(cmgp, c1)))))
  simprd(w0, wceq(cfv(cplusg, cfv(cmgp, c1)), cfv(cplusg, co(c2, cprds, ccom(cmgp, c0)))), wceq(cfv(cbs, cfv(cmgp, c1)), cfv(cbs, co(c2, cprds, ccom(cmgp, c0)))))
  prdsmgp(cfv(cmgp, c1), co(c2, cprds, ccom(cmgp, c0)), c1, c2, c0, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  eqid(co(c2, cprds, ccom(cmgp, c0)))
  ffnd(c0, c3, crg, w0)
  eqtri(ccom(cur, c0), ccom(c0g, ccom(cmgp, c0)), ccom(ccom(c0g, cmgp), c0))
  coeq1i(cur, c0, ccom(c0g, cmgp))
  df-ur()
  coass(c0g, cmgp, c0)
  ringidval(cfv(cur, c1), cfv(cmgp, c1), c1)
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cur, c1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cmgp, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c2, cprds, ccom(cmgp, c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, cfv(cmgp, c1)))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cmgp, c1))
  diff.hs1.c(co(c2, cprds, ccom(cmgp, c0)))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, cfv(cmgp, c1)))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
}

  simprd(w0, (+ `(mulGrp ` c1))=(+ `(c2[×](mulGrp ∘ c0))), (Base `(mulGrp ` c1))=(Base `(c2[×](mulGrp ∘ c0))))

blocks.name: pwsring
blocks.content: A structure power of a ring is a ring. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm pwsring(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, crg))
  -| wceq(c3, co(c0, cpws, c1))
} = {
  eqeltrd(c3, crg, co(cfv(csca, c0), cprds, cxp(c1, csn(c0))), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)))
  pwsval(c0, crg, c1, c2, c3, cfv(csca, c0))
  eqid(cfv(csca, c0))
  prdsringd(co(cfv(csca, c0), cprds, cxp(c1, csn(c0))), cfv(csca, c0), cxp(c1, csn(c0)), c1, c2, universe, wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)))
  eqid(co(cfv(csca, c0), cprds, cxp(c1, csn(c0))))
  simpr(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2))
  fvexd(csca, c0, wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wf(cxp(c1, csn(c0)), c1, crg))
  fconst6g(c0, crg, c1)
}

  simpr(c0 ∈ Ring, c1 ∈ c2)

  adantr(c0 ∈ Ring, c1 ∈ c2, ((c1 × { c0 }): c1 → Ring))
  fconst6g(c0, crg, c1)
}

} = {

  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(ccom(cur, cxp(c1, csn(c0))), cxp(c1, csn(cfv(cur, c0)))), wfn(cur, universe), wcel(c0, universe))

blocks.name: imasring
blocks.content: The image structure of a ring is a ring. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jun-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm imasring(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(cfv(c1, c2), cfv(cur, c0))))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0, co(c1, cimas, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c3)))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cplusg, c3))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cmulr, c3))

blocks.name: qusring2
blocks.content: The quotient structure of a ring is a ring. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jun-2015.)

blocks.name: crngbinom
blocks.content: The binomial theorem for commutative rings (special case of ~ csrgbinom ): ` ( A + B ) ^ N ` is the sum from ` k = 0 ` to ` N ` of ` ( N _C k ) x. ( ( A ^ k ) x. ( B ^ ( N - k ) ) ` . (Contributed by AV, 24-Aug-2019.)
